Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the mandatory revocation of an amusement arcade or gaming cafe license for offering cash prizes or engaging in other unlawful gambling activity.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mandatory revocation of an amusement arcade or gaming cafe license for offering cash prizes or engaging in other unlawful gambling activity.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the mandatory revocation of an amusement arcade or gaming cafe license for offering cash prizes or engaging in other unlawful gambling activity.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
